hero.title: Where Stories Come to Life
hero.subtitle: Connecting readers with books that inspire, educate, and entertain since 2019

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: We believe that every book has the power to open new worlds, spark imagination, and transform lives. Our mission is to make quality literature accessible to everyone, fostering a community of passionate readers.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: What started as a small Facebook page sharing book recommendations has grown into a thriving online bookstore serving thousands of book lovers. We carefully curate every title in our collection, ensuring that each book meets our standards of quality and value.
story.p2: From bestsellers to hidden gems, from classic literature to contemporary fiction, we've built a collection that caters to every reader's taste. Our journey has been driven by one simple belief: the right book at the right time can change everything.

v1.title: Quality First
v1.desc: Every book in our collection is carefully selected and verified for authenticity.

v2.title: Customer Happiness
v2.desc: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We're here to help you find your next favorite book.

v3.title: Community
v3.desc: We're more than a bookstore – we're a community of readers who love to share and discover.

v4.title: Accessibility
v4.desc: Great books should be available to everyone. We work hard to keep our prices fair.

why.title: Why Choose Us
why.i1: Carefully curated selection of quality books
why.i2: Fast and reliable delivery across the country
